mapper.select: select bnd_groupjoin.group_no, bnd_groupjoin.member_id, bnd_groupjoin.member_level, bnd_groupjoin.group_joindate from bnd_member, bnd_groupjoin where bnd_member.member_id = bnd_groupjoin.member_id and bnd_groupjoin.group_no = #{group_no}
select bnd_member.member_id from bnd_member where bnd_member.member_id = #{member_id}
